content: > wow this simple knit placemat works-up in lovely stripes thanks to lily sugar n cream also listed as bernat placemat 1 on the yarnspirations site but the download there leads to the version using bernat holidays sparkle solid color in knit only > sweet and easy placemats work up into pretty stripes using bernat handicrafter cotton stripes the pdf instructions also include a knit version 2 1 https //www yarnspirations com/bernat-placemat/brk0537-003522m html 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/stripes-placemat-knit
